snippet: Paul D. Ryan dialed up the rhetoric against President Obama a few degrees hotter than it has been, caustically accusing the president of only being able "to talk a good game."
abstract: Paul D. Ryan dialed up the rhetoric against President Obama a few degrees hotter than it has been, caustically accusing the president of only being able "to talk a good game."

headline.main: Speaking at Values Voter Summit, Ryan Says Obama Creates 'Straw-Man' Issues
